title: Christmas recap edition: This week's Silicon Tally
contentencoded:
It's time for Silicon Tally. How well have you kept up with the week in tech news?

This week, Zach Seward, senior editor for Quartz, talks tech and takes the test.

Play along at home, below.
description: 60 million coins, 300 hours and $3.58. Know what those numbers mean? Must be another Silicon Tally!

itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, December 27, 2013
